long_description: The insulated Merrell Intercept jacket offers cozy comfort in cold weather and converts into a pillow so you can catch some shut-eye when your outdoor adventures have worn you out for the day. Jacket packs into its own interior lumbar pocket to become a convenient neck pillow for lightweight travel and backpacking. Intercept jacket keeps you cozy with 100g lightweight Opti-Warm(TM) synthetic insulation that keeps you warm even while wet. Polyester shell with Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain; polyester taffeta lining slides on easily over other layers. Spandex cuffs and drawcord adjustable hem seal in warmth; hem adjustment toggles are accessed through pockets so your hands stay warm. Merrell Intercept jacket features zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
